title: Title & Subtitle For Amazon KDP Low Content Books - KDP Keyword Research & Strategy
description:
Let's understand the title and subtitle for your KDP Low Content Books. This is what your potential customers use to find your books so it's one of the most important parts of your KDP listing and it pays to get it right. We talk about Amazon's requirements around what you can and can't enter in your title and subtitle fields as well as how to structure these two parts of your listings to help increase your chances of showing up higher in the search results. 

LEARN HOW TO CREATE & SELF-PUBLISH KID'S PICTURE BOOKS
